steps.name: Given I open Mars Airline home page
When I search flight with "July", "December (two years from now)" and "YT5-231-016"
Select item 'December (two years from now)' in 'Returning' dropdown element
select December (two years from now), {force: false}
page load --waiting for new page to load--
Then I should see invalid promotion code message for promotion code "YT5-231-016"
Validate element 'Invalid Promotion Code Text Message' should contains text: 'Sorry, code YT5-231-016 is not valid'

assert expected **[

, 3 more... ]** to contain text **Sorry, code YT5-231-016 is not valid**, but the text was **Seats available!Promotional code YT5-231-016 used: 50% discount!Call now on 0800 MARSAIR to book! Back**
